patthana16.81:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.81:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
